archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.2.5: Management of access control privileges should be supported by access control models such as Mandatory Access Control (MAC), Discretionary Access Control (DAC) or Role-Based Access Control (RBAC).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
